name: Character Maker QR
first_mes:
Required Downloads

Lorebook that is need for it to work [Character Maker Combined NSFW Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW.json) Sort it after Name A-Z --- [LALib](https://github.com/LenAnderson/SillyTavern-LALib) required for Character Maker LaLib Chat Quick Reply Sets If you are on the main branch you need to downgrade LALib to an older version you do that by opening the ```data\user\extensions\SillyTavern-LALib``` folder in a cmd prompt and run the command ```git checkout e471882``` `user` is the username of the ST-Account. ---

Quick Reply Sets

[Visible QR Buttons](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker.json) The only set you need to add to the Global Quick Reply Sets (Needed) It contains 3 buttons. - New Chat and Set Character Gender and Type (Makes a new chat and lets you select Gender, Type and transformation of the character. **Start with this**) - Character Generator Swipe (Lets you swipe the last message making a new one without loosing the old one) - Generate Character Choice (Lets you select what you want to generate next) [Character Maker Generation](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V3%20LaLib.json) All the logic for the Generate Character Choice button. (Needed) 01. Generate Basic Information (Needs to be first) 02. Generate Appearance information (Can be used multiple times) 03. Generate Outfit and Gear (Can be used multiple times) 04. Generate Personality Traits And Quirks 05. Generate Relationship Information (Family, Friends, Enemies and Rivals) 06. Generate Known Kinks 07. Generate Latent Kinks (Will be hidden from the rest of the generation) 08. Generate Background Information 09. Generate Interaction Style 10. Generate Contextual Information (Setting and Daily Routine) 11. Additional Notes (Strengths, Weaknesses, Likes, Dislikes, Sexual Knowledge and Sexual Experience) 12. Spells and Abilities 13. Copy Character Rules (Copies the rules the character will follow to the chat from the Lorebook) 14. Generate Extras (Personality Summary and Speech Examples) 15. Generate Scenario (Makes a scenario that can be used as a first message) (Can make multiple) ---

Optional Downloads

[TabbyAPI Models](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/TabbyAPI%20Loader%20Setting.json) Models and settings i have tried.
creatorcomment:
Using a empty persona is recommended. If you have any tips on refinements of the Lorebook/QR buttons make a comment (On [chub.ai](https://chub.ai/characters/Drago87/character-maker-sillytavern-quick-reply-driven-0eb2c2852a4f) or on the [github](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker)) and i will look it over. Especially the `/genraw` ---

Last Update

V5 Remade the card to lean more on the QR Buttons Made a button to select what you want to do instead of multiple buttons cluttering the UI So now you only have 3 buttons "New Character" (Selects what type of character you make), "Swipe" (A button to make a Swipe of the last message using the logic for the other buttons) and "Generate" (Lets you select what you want to generate.) Sadly this breaks the normal "Swipe" and "Continue" buttons for most generations (on this card) ---

Required Downloads

Lorebook that is need for it to work [Character Maker Combined NSFW Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW.json) Sort after Name A-Z --- [Tags](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Character%20Maker%20Lore%20Tags.json) that is needed for the Lorebook to work. (This needs to be downloaded and imported as tags get a random 'ID' when made. Importing this makes sure the 'ID' is the same.) --- [LALib](https://github.com/LenAnderson/SillyTavern-LALib) required for Character Maker LaLib Chat Quick Reply Sets If you are on the main branch you need to downgrade LALib to an older version you do that by opening the ```data\user\extensions\SillyTavern-LALib``` folder in a cmd prompt and run the command ```git checkout e471882``` --- [Character Maker LaLib Chat Quick Reply Sets](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V3%20LaLib.json) For ease of use download and import to the Quick Reply Extension. When pressing the button it will make a {{user}} response with the message fields content followed by the Category and starts to generate the content. It will also hide older Generate Messages to save on tokens and to prevent generating the same categories multiple times. (Updated to ignore order of generation except for 'Basic Information' (Must be first) and 'Scenario' (Must be last. Can have multiple)) --- [Character Gener/Type](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Gender_Type.json) A QR button to let you Select the Gender and Type of character you want to make. It also have a button to Swipe a new response. This will not work (for now) with character that can transform when Swiping the Appearance Info. ___ All extra information like age/kinks/fears/species will guide the direction of the character. You can then edit the output to your liking or make it regen all of it or part of it. If you want to make another character for a group chat you can continue asking for a new character and it will usually work but have a tendency to copy data 1:1 except for names to the new character. Then using [Intro Writer Chan](https://chub.ai/characters/fbdnchoco/intro-writer-chan-3721039feacc) You can generate a First Message I recommend to use the [Rules](https://chub.ai/lorebooks/Drago87/rules-adee6303ba75) lorebook with the character made If you can think of something to make it better plz make a comment or make a fork (then a comment with a link to the fork) Lorebook with settings and links to Models i have tested [TabbyAPI Loader Setting](https://snippet.host/uozyow) I'm running "icefog72/IceSakeRP-7b-8bpw-exl2" At the moment --- Known Problems Some subcategories need refining ---

Version history V5 Remade the card to lean more on the QR Buttons Made a button to select what you want to do instead of multiple buttons cluttering the UI So now you only have 3 buttons "New Character" (Selects what type of character you make), "Swipe" (A button to make a Swipe of the last message using the logic for the other buttons) and "Generate" (Lets you select what you want to generate.) Sadly this breaks the normal "Swipe" and "Continue" buttons for most generations (on this card) V4.3 Re added LALib requirement for QR buttons Added a popup for '2. Generate Appearance Info' asking for What type of For the appearance should generate for (Human Form, Alternate Form) Mostly for Werewolf's and other shapeshifters. (Only for Demi-Humans for now) Updated Lorebook to reflect this. Added a new QR button that is using LALib (This is the one that is going to be updated going forward) The old QR button is updated to work with this update but will not be updated any more. Updated Character Card's Alt. Greeting with new links. I will probably remove outfit from '2. Generate Appearance Info' making it separate enabling you to generate Different outfits for different occasions. V4.2 Made a new QR button that lets you select the Gender and Type of character you want to make. Changed from snippet.host to github.com for links. Updated the character card and Lorebook to reflect link changes and added QR button (See Alt. Greetings for updated links and link to new QR Button). The '2. Generate Appearance Info' QR button now asks for what type of outfit (One-Piece or Two-Piece) the character should have (Only Females). Lorebook Updated to reflect this. V4.1.3 Updated Quick Replies for more dynamic hiding of generate messages especially Latent kinks and Scenario. V4.1.2 Updated Lorebook to have allow different types of outfits (For now, One-Piece and Two-Piece outfit, and only for females) Updated Quick Replies to allow the user to select the type of outfit (Working on a check to see if the character is a male or female) V4.1.1 Small changes to the Lorebook V4.1 Updated the Quick Replies to not needing LALib and they can now be Generated in any order (Still recommended to Generate in the numbered order) 'Basic Information' still needs to be first 'Scenario' still needs to be last (You can make multiple) V4.0 Extensive changes done to the Lorebook and card Read Alt greeting 2 for downloads Added Demi-Humans, Beastkin, Pokémon (WIP but usable with a Pokémon Lorebook), Machines (Heavy WIP almost no testing done) V3.0 Rewritten to use a Lorebook based style for easier overview and ease of use. V2.1 Added Example dialogs V2.0 Split from [Character Maker](https://chub.ai/characters/Drago87/character-maker-b47ccbf9b852) to make it easier to make more gender/species specific Example dialogs V1.3.0 Changed Initial message 2 to only make humans Added Initial message 3 to make non-humans Changed Unknown Fetish to Latent Fetish V1.2.1 Added recommendation for lorebook to use with character (nothing else changed) V1.2 Added Knowledge and Experience, changed Scenario V1.1 Changed Tagline V1.0 Initial upload

data.creator: DrDrago87
alternate_greetings:
Give me information of the Character you want me to generate.
The more information you can give the better, but I will generate any missing information.

When you have given the information you like i will flesh everything out using the template.
